trans-unit.source: Defines the basic functionality of a principal object.
trans-unit.target: 定义主体对象的基本功能。

trans-unit.source: A principal object represents the security context of the user on whose behalf the code is running, including that user's identity (<xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>) and any roles to which they belong.
trans-unit.target: 主体对象表示的名义运行代码，它包括该用户的标识的用户的安全上下文 (<xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>) 和它们属于任何角色。

trans-unit.source: All principal objects are required to implement the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现所需的所有主体对象<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>接口。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> implementations, see the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>实现中，请参阅<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the identity of the current principal.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity" /> object associated with the current principal.
trans-unit.target: 与当前用户关联的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The name of the role for which to check membership.
trans-unit.target: 要检查其成员资格的角色的名称。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current principal belongs to the specified role.
trans-unit.target: 确定当前用户是否属于指定的角色。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current principal is a member of the specified role; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前用户是指定角色的成员，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。
